alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 24 at 8:54PM PST until January 26 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO NOON PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph Los Angeles county mountains. * WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to noon PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include Interstate 5, as well as Highways 2, 14, and 39.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
